attributes.action: Legalize Gay Marriage In The UK!
attributes.additional_details:
I believe that if marriage is so sacred, and if a couple truly loves one another, then they should be accepted a marriage; whether it is a Heterosexual, Homosexual, Pan-sexual, Bisexual, Transsexual or Lesbian couple.

And for all you homophobic preachers out there, think about this one thing:

Whilst you preach about how 'awful' or 'disgusting' homosexuality etc. is. Think about this; your own child, if you have one, could be one of these 'abominations' you speak of. And so perhaps, as a result of your preaching, they are too afraid to stand up for themselves, and have been worn down to a state where they are so afraid, and so ashamed, that they dare not come out.

I am but I mere 13 year old girl, who's ambition is to be able to change the way our society works, and make marriage equality, as big a issue, as racial equality.

Love is not a sin. Hate is.
